items.title: Portal for Release Management
items.description: Develop a centralized web portal to manage software release processes, including scheduling, tracking, and documentation.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in with secure authentication
User can create, edit, and delete release entries
System displays a calendar view of upcoming releases
System allows attaching documentation to each release
Release status can be updated and tracked in real-time
non_functional: System must support at least 100 concurrent users
Portal must be accessible via major browsers

notes: User request was vague; assumed need for a web-based portal with core release management features. Specific workflows, integrations, and reporting requirements to be clarified.
